CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 花（金钱或时间）；花费；度过；消耗；用尽；耗尽；投入
（为某目的或某段时间内的）花销；开销

synonym.mean: 度过，消磨；花费；浪费；用尽

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 花费（spend的过去分词）；浪费；耗费
挥金如土的人；挥霍者；用钱的人
花费；度过（spend的现在分词形式）

word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通用词，指需要占用空间、时间或精力等，其主语可以是人，也可以是一件事情。
较正式用词，通常指为某一专门目的而花费大量金钱、时间或精力。
指花费时间、金钱、劳力等。其主语是物，而不能由人充当，也不用被动形式。
普通用词，与cost基本同义，但主语必须是人。

word_group.brief_definition: 在...方面花费；在...方面花费时间；在...方面花费金钱
解手, 方便(委婉说法, 与 use the toilet 同义)
快速赚钱；快速亏钱；快速花钱
可能会花；可能花；可能要花

bilingual.source: He decided to spend his vacation in Europe.
bilingual.target: 他决定花费假期在欧洲。

bilingual.source: I need to spend more time on my studies.
bilingual.target: 我需要花费更多时间在学习上。

bilingual.source: She likes to spend her weekends hiking.
bilingual.target: 她喜欢花费周末时间去徒步旅行。

bilingual.source: Gardeners spend a lot of time pruning the bushes.
bilingual.target: 园丁花费大量时间修剪灌木。

bilingual.source: They often spend their evenings watching movies.
bilingual.target: 他们经常花费晚上时间看电影。

bilingual.source: They didn't spend a single sou on luxuries.
bilingual.target: 他们在奢侈品上没有花费一点点钱。

bilingual.source: Truckers often spend long hours on the road.
bilingual.target: 卡车司机经常在路上花费很长时间。

bilingual.source: Many people spend hours every day in cyberspace.
bilingual.target: 许多人每天在网络空间中花费数小时。

bilingual.source: Advertisers spend a lot of money on digital marketing.
bilingual.target: 广告商在数字营销上花费了大量资金。

bilingual.source: We should spend less money on unnecessary things.
bilingual.target: 我们应该花费更少的钱在不必要的东西上。

list.abstract: spend，音标 [spend]，英语单词。作动词指用钱、度过；作名词指支出、开销、花费。例句：They spend most of their lives drawing.（他们大部分时间都在画画。） spend的近义词有：invested、lose、cost、last等。

yingyinNormal.en: So, you're going to spend hours and hours combing through all this stuff?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你打算花费大把时间重读这些玩意啊？

yingyinNormal.en: From missiles to submarines, fighter jets to spy balloons, we spend over $400 billion a year just making arms.
yingyinNormal.zh: 从导弹到潜水艇，从喷气飞机到侦察气球，我们每年花费超过4千亿来制造武器。

yingyinNormal.en: 800 miles inland from coastal China, the new Chinese middle class like to spend their leisure time by the water without having to travel miles to get to the beach.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在距沿海一千二百多公里的内陆地区，中国的新晋中产阶级乐于将他们的休闲时光花费在人造沙滩上，不必为了去海滩而跋山涉水。

yingyinNormal.en: I could spend more time with you and the kids.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我可以多陪陪你和孩子。

yingyinNormal.en: You know what? I'll just spend the evening alone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 算了，我今晚就一个人过吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Really? That's how you're gonna spend your Saturday night?
yingyinNormal.zh: 真的吗？周六晚你就打算这么庆祝啊？

yingyinNormal.en: Five bob! We'll spend five bob here, we'll spend five bob there, and next thing we know that's our savings down the drain.
yingyinNormal.zh: 5先令! 这也5先令 那也5先令，到最后所有的积蓄都花光了。

yingyinNormal.en: You think you pay me enough to spend it in two places?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你觉得你给的这点薪水够我花到两处吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Oh my God. Look at this, how did I spend so much money?
yingyinNormal.zh: 天啊，你看看，我怎么会花这么多钱？

yingyinNormal.en: I don't want to spend the whole day playing a board game.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不想要一整天都留在家里玩桌游。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, if I did run, I'd spend the next few months fundraising.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要是决定竞选，接下来几个月我就得筹款。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, I did spend a lot of my shower time with Lieutenant Uhura.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的浴室"自乐"时间有不少是跟乌乎拉通讯官度过的。

yingyinNormal.en: I can see I'll spend the rest of my life paying by instalments.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看来我下半辈子都要分期还债了。

yingyinNormal.en: So, she's deceiving me in order to spend more time with me. Yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以她欺骗我，是为了能跟我多待一段时间？是的。

yingyinNormal.en: Is working on magic tricks really how you want to spend your time?
yingyinNormal.zh: 难道你的人生就指着这些魔术小把戏了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah. It's a shame you two didn't get to spend more time together.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没错，你们俩没多相处相处太可惜了

yingyinNormal.en: It took me 28 years to find one man that I wanna spend my life with.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我花了28年，找到一个想与他共度终身的男人。

yingyinNormal.en: Do you mind if I spend the weekend playing video games with the guys?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你介意我这个周末跟他们几个玩网游吗？

yingyinNormal.en: "Okay, I'm going"? I spend hours trying, and then you just come one...
yingyinNormal.zh: “好吧，我去睡”？我努力了好几个小时，而你上来就……

yingyinNormal.en: Can you really afford to spend four months reading novels in the Alps?
yingyinNormal.zh: 您真的受得了在阿尔卑斯山脉读四个月的小说吗？

exam_freq_info.chinese: 消耗(时间; 精力); 度过

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 在...方面花费；在...方面花费时间；在...方面花费金钱

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 用过的；失去效能的；耗尽的；精疲力竭的

word_family.mean: v. 用钱；花费；度过；用尽；耗尽；花钱；花时间

sense_info_list.en: pay out money in buying or hiring goods or services

examination_example.sentence: In 2015, the US Forest Service for the first time <highlight>spent</highlight> more than half of its $5.5 billion annual budget fighting fires.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2015年，美国林业局用于灭火的预算首次超过其55亿美元年度预算的一半。

examination_example.sentence: 5 billion annual budget fighting fires — nearly double the percentage it <highlight>spent</highlight> on such efforts 20 years ago.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 50亿英镑的年度灭火预算——几乎是20年前在这方面花费的两倍。

examination_example.sentence: But most people will come away from this book believing it was money well <highlight>spent</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是大多数人读完这本书后会感觉物有所值。

sense_info_list.zh: 消耗(时间; 精力); 度过

examination_example.sentence: Critically, another group was asked to <highlight>spend</highlight> a minute writing down reasons for their judgment, before giving the rating.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 至关重要的是，另一组被要求花一分钟写下他们做出判断的原因，然后给出评级。

examination_example.sentence: Those first few days should be <highlight>spent</highlight> looking for work, not looking to sign on.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最初的几天应该用来找工作，而不是签约。

examination_example.sentence: But historically we have <highlight>spent</highlight> about 12 percent of our days contemplating the longer term.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但从历史上看，我们花了大约12%的时间思考长期问题。

word_usage.usage:
pass和spend都可表示“度过时间”，二者区别在于：
(1) 表示在等待的过程中做某事打发时间，可以用pass the time。表示一段时间已经流逝，可以用pass。
例：The first few days passed. 最初几天过去了，
(2) 表示花一段时间做某事或呆在某个地方，用 spend。
例：I spent three days cleaning our flat. 我花了三天打扫我们的公寓。

表示“花费”时：
spend指花费金钱、时间、精力等，主语通常为人或机构，常用于spend sth. on sth./(in) doing sth. 结构中。
cost主语通常为事物，可后接双宾语，通常不用被动语态。
take主语可以是人，也可以是事物，通常以it作形式主语，可后接双宾语。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 用钱；花费；度过；用尽；耗尽；花钱；花时间

sense_info_list.en: cause or allow as time to pass

examination_example.sentence: Those <highlight>spending</highlight> 10-19 hours per week on their devices were 41 percent more likely to be unhappy than lower-frequency users.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 比起相对不那么频繁的使用者来说，那些每周花在电子设备上的时间达到10-19个小时的人群中，41%更容易感到不开心。

examination_example.sentence: The researchers looked at time <highlight>spent</highlight> in a number of activities that could plausibly be driving the weeing decline.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员研究了花费在许多活动上的时间，这些活动有可能是导致衰落的原因。

examination_example.sentence: While Thanksgiving, Black Friday and Cyber Monday all saw record <highlight>spending</highlight> online, in-store sales plunged over the holiday weekend.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在感恩节，黑色星期五和网络星期一期间，网上消费均创历史新高，而假日的店内销售则大幅下降。

sense_info_list.en: pay out money in buying or hiring goods or services

examination_example.sentence: The growth in public agricultural research <highlight>spending</highlight> peaked in the 1970s and has been shrinking ever since.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公共农业研究支出的增长在20世纪70年代达到顶峰，此后一直在萎缩。

examination_example.sentence: But while there is money available to be <highlight>spent</highlight> on it, the search to understand the secrets of ageing will be ongoing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，尽管有资金可用于此，但了解衰老秘密的探索仍将继续。

examination_example.sentence: You have to <highlight>spend</highlight> substantial capital in creating awareness around their likeness and making sure people are familiar with who they are.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你必须投入大量资金，让人们了解他们的相似之处，并确保他们熟悉自己。

word_usage.usage:
spend作动词，表“花费时间, 精力或金钱”，其主语只能是人，不能是事/物。“在...上花钱/花时间”，?spend后通常跟on sth.或用(in) doing sth.。
示例：她花了三个小时看电视。
误 She spent three hours to watch TV.
正 She spent three hours (in) watching TV.

spend表“度过”时，为及物动词，其后要接宾语。 ?
示例：昨天晚上我去看电影了，你怎么度过的?
误 Last night I went to the cinema. How did you spend?
正 Last night I went to the cinema. How did you spend the night?

spend和pass都可表“度过(时间)”，但消磨时间通常用pass表达。
示例：我们去电影院消磨时间。
误 We went to the cinema to spend the time.
正 We went to the cinema to pass the time.

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 在...方面花费；在...方面花费时间；在...方面花费金钱

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: cause or allow as time to pass

examination_example.sentence: But many people choose to <highlight>spend</highlight> their time playing computer games.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是很多人会选择玩电脑来消磨时光。

examination_example.sentence: An urban food myth contends that if food <highlight>spends</highlight> just a few seconds on the floor, dirt and germs won't have much of a chance to contaminate it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 都市饮食神话认为，如果食物仅在地板上停留几秒钟，污垢和细菌就不会被污染。

examination_example.sentence: On the subject of obesity, she pointed out that consumers lifestyles have changed significantly, with many people being more sedentary (久坐不动的) not least because more time is <highlight>spent</highlight> in front of computers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在肥胖问题上，她指出，消费者的生活方式已经发生了很大的变化，许多人更加久坐不动，尤其是因为花在电脑前的时间更多。

sense_info_list.en: pay out money in buying or hiring goods or services

examination_example.sentence: What does England <highlight>spend</highlight> an annual three million pounds on?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英格兰每年花300万英镑在什么地方?

examination_example.sentence: Americans <highlight>spend</highlight> billions of dollars each year trying to change their weight.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国人每年花费数十亿美元来改变体重。

examination_example.sentence: The cost for saving our civilization would be considerably less than the world's current military <highlight>spending</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 拯救我们文明的成本将大大低于世界目前的军队费用开支。

word_usage.usage:
spend表“度过”时，为及物动词，其后要接宾语。 ?
示例：昨天晚上我去看电影了，你怎么度过的?
误 Last night I went to the cinema. How did you spend?
正 Last night I went to the cinema. How did you spend the night?

spend和pass都可表“度过(时间)”，但消磨时间通常用pass表达。
示例：我们去电影院消磨时间。
误 We went to the cinema to spend the time.
正 We went to the cinema to pass the time.

spend作动词，表“花费时间, 精力或金钱”，其主语只能是人，不能是事/物。“在...上花钱/花时间”，?spend后通常跟on sth.或用(in) doing sth.。
示例：她花了三个小时看电视。
误 She spent three hours to watch TV.
正 She spent three hours (in) watching TV.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: cause or allow as time to pass

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>spent</highlight> time improving his painting skills and began to sell his paintings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他花时间提高自己的绘画技巧，并开始出售他的画。

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>spent</highlight> much of his childhood in France where he <highlight>spent</highlight> many hours each day outdoors painting pictures.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他童年的大部分时间是在法国度过的，在那里他每天花很多时间在户外画画。

examination_example.sentence: If anyone had told me three years ago that I would be <highlight>spending</highlight> most of my weekends camping.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果三年前有人告诉我的话，我会把大部分周末都花在露营上。

examination_example.sentence: If we stay at home, it is comfortable and there is no need to <highlight>spend</highlight> money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 家里很舒服，如果我们待在家里，就无需花钱。

sense_info_list.en: pay out money in buying or hiring goods or services

examination_example.sentence: With food our biggest weekly household expense, Susanna and Matt <highlight>spend</highlight> time with a different family each week.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 食物是我们每周最大的家庭开支，苏珊娜和马特每周都会与不同的家庭共度时光。

word_usage.usage:
①on搭配（跟名词、代词）：
spend time on the lessons 	花时间在功课上
②跟in搭配（in可以省略，跟动名词）：
spend the evenings in washing the windows 	晚上的时间花在擦窗户上

exam_freq_info.chinese: 花费; 消耗(时间; 精力)

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 用过的；失去效能的；耗尽的；精疲力竭的

word_family.mean: v. 用钱；花费；度过；用尽；耗尽；花钱；花时间

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 在...方面花费；在...方面花费时间；在...方面花费金钱

sense_info_list.zh: 花费; 消耗(时间; 精力)

examination_example.sentence: He has <highlight>spent</highlight> nearly two years planting flowers for his blind wife.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他花了将近两年的时间为他失明的妻子种花。

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>spent</highlight> much time on my phone without doing my homework.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我花了很多时间玩手机，没有做家庭作业。

examination_example.sentence: She <highlight>spent</highlight> almost the whole day trying to do the work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她花了几乎一整天的时间尝试做这项工作。

sense_info_list.en: pay out money in buying or hiring goods or services

examination_example.sentence: But I had <highlight>spent</highlight> two pennies without Grandma's permission.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是我没有得到奶奶的允许就花了两便士。

examination_example.sentence: I would have a nickel and two pennies back. I was sure Grandma wouldn't care if I <highlight>spent</highlight> one penny.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我会拿回一枚五分硬币和两枚一分硬币。我确信奶奶不会介意我花一分钱。

examination_example.sentence: She <highlight>spent</highlight> more than 50 dollars buying it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她花了50多美元买了它。

word_usage.usage:
spend作动词，表“花费时间, 精力或金钱”，其主语只能是人，不能是事/物。“在...上花钱/花时间”，?spend后通常跟on sth.或用(in) doing sth.。
示例：她花了三个小时看电视。
误 She spent three hours to watch TV.
正 She spent three hours (in) watching TV.

spend表“度过”时，为及物动词，其后要接宾语。 ?
示例：昨天晚上我去看电影了，你怎么度过的?
误 Last night I went to the cinema. How did you spend?
正 Last night I went to the cinema. How did you spend the night?

spend和pass都可表“度过(时间)”，但消磨时间通常用pass表达。
示例：我们去电影院消磨时间。
误 We went to the cinema to spend the time.
正 We went to the cinema to pass the time.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation:
常用于表示“花钱”，主语多是事或物。常见搭配是“Sth. costs sb.+钱数”。
例：A full day’s activities will cost you £45.
全天的活动收费为45英镑。（朗文）

常用于表示“花钱”，主语是人，和介词for搭配。常见搭配是"sb. pays some money for sth."。
例：She pays £200 a week for this apartment.
这套房子她每周要付租金200英镑。（牛津）

既可以表示“花时间”，也可以表示“花钱”，主语是人。常见搭配是“sb. spends some money/time on sth./（in） doing sth."。
例：My sister spends most of her money on clothes.
我姐姐把大多数钱都花在衣服上了。

常用于表示“花时间”。常见搭配是"It takes sb. some time to do sth. ” 或"sth. takes sb. some time”。
例：It took me two hours to finish the model plane.
完成那个飞机模型花了我两个小时的时间。
